name: Listen (xnhakira)
description:
So we were thinking a lot about the given theme and our main objective was to make something which will set our game apart from others. So we simply googled the qualities of a "Down to Earth" man and one of the key qualities of him was to "listen". A down to earth human pays attention to what one has to say. He is humble, respecting and with a peaceful mind. So with that kept in our minds, we designed a game where you have to listen carefully to the sounds in the game and move along that way to keep moving forward.

1. Team Name 

4 Paths
